meanings.definition: The quality of being gritty or containing grit.
meanings.sent1: The grittiness of the sandpaper made it perfect for smoothing the wood.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the grittiness of the sugar between my fingers as I poured it into the bowl.
meanings.sent3: The grittiness of the cookie dough surprised me, but it added a nice crunch.
meanings.sent4: Her determination had the grittiness of a rock, unyielding and strong.
meanings.sent5: The grittiness of the situation was palpable, like walking on a beach covered in shells.

meanings.definition: The state of being determined and showing courage in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent1: His grittiness in training paid off when he won the race against all odds.
meanings.sent2: The grittiness of her character shone through when she stood up to the bully.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small size, his grittiness in the game intimidated the opponents.
meanings.sent4: The grittiness of her spirit was like a beacon of light in the darkest times.
meanings.sent5: The grittiness in her eyes revealed a strength that could not be broken.
